import { Bars3Icon } from '@heroicons/react/24/solid' import { useState } from 'react' import logoImg from "../assets/logo.png" export default function Header(){ const [toggleMenu, setToggleMenu] = useState(false ); return
  • Home

  • Resume
  • Contact
{ toggleMenu &&
    setToggleMenu(! toggleMenu)} className="flex flex-col text-white mobile-nav">
  • Home

  • Contact
}
}
